header.title: Find Your Perfect Rental
header.subtitle: Search thousands of properties with honest reviews from real renters

disclaimer.title: Community-Submitted Property:
disclaimer.message: This property information was submitted by the community and has not been verified by the landlord. Data accuracy cannot be guaranteed. Please verify all details independently before making rental decisions.

propertyDetails.unverifiedWarning1: ‚Ä¢ This property was submitted by community members, not the landlord
propertyDetails.unverifiedWarning2: ‚Ä¢ Property details may be inaccurate or outdated
propertyDetails.unverifiedWarning3: ‚Ä¢ Always verify information independently before making decisions
propertyDetails.unverifiedWarning4: ‚Ä¢ Contact the property directly to confirm availability and details
propertyDetails.noReviewsMessage: No reviews yet. Be the first to share your experience!

reviewWarning.title: Review Unverified Property
reviewWarning.subtitle: This property information hasn't been verified by the landlord
reviewWarning.warning1: ‚Ä¢ Verify the property address and details independently
reviewWarning.warning2: ‚Ä¢ Confirm you actually lived at this exact property
reviewWarning.warning3: ‚Ä¢ Ensure the landlord information is accurate
reviewWarning.warning4: ‚Ä¢ Be aware that property details may be outdated
reviewWarning.confirmationText: By proceeding, you confirm that you have independently verified this property information and that your review is based on your actual rental experience.

claimModal.title: Claim This Property
claimModal.subtitle: Are you the owner or manager of this property?
claimModal.verificationPlaceholder: Please provide any details that prove you manage this property (lease agreements, utility bills, property management license, etc.)
claimModal.legalConfirmation: I confirm under penalty of perjury that I am the legal owner or authorized manager of this property. I understand that false claims may result in account suspension.
claimModal.missingConfirmation: You must confirm the legal statement to proceed.

claimSuccess.title: Claim Submitted!
claimSuccess.message: Your property claim has been submitted for review. We'll verify your ownership and notify you within 1-3 business days.
claimSuccess.nextStepsMessage: Complete your landlord verification in your dashboard to speed up the claim process.

sarah.text: Amazing property! The landlord is very responsive and the apartment is exactly as described. Highly recommend!

mike.text: Great location and fair rent. Had a small maintenance issue that was fixed quickly.

jessica.text: Beautiful apartment in a quiet neighborhood. Landlord is professional and respectful.
